
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52373219">
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5">在传统中医的宝库中，手诊是一扇通往健康的神奇窗口。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5">它通过观察手部特征，帮助我们了解身体状况。</font></font></font><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><img src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/smiley/laohu/laohu33.gif" smilieid="997" border="0" alt=""><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><font color="#ff0000">《老中医教你手诊》彩色版</font><font color="#24292f">，为您揭示手诊的魅力与实用技巧。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_a1z68" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/a191fce5-0801-4475-b686-918f31dfb8e3_ed204f8c470c5.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/a191fce5-0801-4475-b686-918f31dfb8e3_ed204f8c470c5.png"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<strong><br>
</strong><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#ff0000"><font size="5"> 手诊的基本理论</font></font><font color="#24292f"><font size="4">手部是身体的缩影，各个部位与脏腑有着密切联系。</font></font></font><br>
<font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font size="4"><font color="#24292f">通过细致观察手掌、手指的颜色、纹路、形态等，可以推测出身体的健康状况。</font></font></font><br>
<font size="5"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, Noto Sans, Helvetica Neue, Helvetica, Nimbus Sans L, Arial, Liberation Sans, PingFang SC, Hiragino Sans GB, Noto Sans CJK SC, Source Han Sans SC, Source Han Sans CN, Microsoft YaHei, Wenquanyi Micro Hei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei, ST Heiti, SimHei, WenQuanYi Zen Hei Sharp, sans-serif"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<img id="aimg_SAnHo" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="597" height="756" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1bc2dfef-2efe-46ab-b3b4-f72a19e32445_da7bf7cc71c74.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/1bc2dfef-2efe-46ab-b3b4-f72a19e32445_da7bf7cc71c74.png"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="5"><font color="#24292f"><br>
</font></font></font><br>
<font size="5"><br>
</font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">通过简单的手诊技巧，您可以在日常生活中及时发现一些健康问题。</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">例如，若发现手掌偏于苍白，建议关注心肺功能，多进行户外运动；</font></font></font><br>
<font color="#24292f"><font face="AlibabaPuHuiTi, -apple-system, &amp;quot"><font size="4">若手指常常肿胀，可以考虑调节饮食，避免过量盐分摄入。</font></font></font><br>
<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_B5rRS" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/60619e2a-1d75-425c-af83-38ae98c3b5d8_9c3b125657cf3.png" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://pic2.ziyuan.wang/user/a343235848/2025/02/60619e2a-1d75-425c-af83-38ae98c3b5d8_9c3b125657cf3.png"><br>
